document_data.mainbody:
endetta Kress was a tiefling businesswoman who lived in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Usually she sold wine and spirits for the Oathoon patriar family. She had a web of contacts in the city, including every tavern owner in the city. 
In the , Vendetta was abducted while walking in the Lower City by Dead Three cultists. During her captivity, she was interrogated about her masters security measures. During that time she witnessed the interrogation and eventual death of Effinax Zalbor and overheard rumors about a possible means of escape.
